WorkItem.Description:
Tranfer BusinessObjects from one PC to another. 

I thought on:
1.serialize a BO object
2.transfer it to another PC
3.deserialize it with correct type, so that a object.consistencyCheck() method can be called
4.make a consistency check 
(enhanced: call aditional data from sender which is missing)
5.save to db

The thing with the type would make it more interesting. If using WCF i mostly use a method for each BO. But think on an incresing number of BO. So the transfer of the objects shoudl be independend of the type.
